time.description: The date and time of the event (on the server).

browserTime.description: The date and time of the event (on the client).

userID.description: The Zooniverse User ID of the user performing the event

type.description: The event type e.g. login, leave, classify, view, etc

subjectID.description: If the event applies to a subject, e.g. classify, then this is the Zooniverse ID of the subject

relatedID.description: If applicable, this may contain a related ID such as collection ID, classification ID, etc

projectToken.description: The project identifier as used at https://api.zooniverse.org/projects/list , e.g. 'serengeti' )

data.description: An optional bundle of JSON data to store additional info about the logged event.

sessionNumber.description: The user-specific session counter for this event (new session starts after 30 mins inactivity)

eventNumber.description: The session-specific event counter for this event (new session starts after 30 mins inactivity)

serverURL.description: The URL of the website from which the logging request originated

clientIP.description: The IP address of the browser from which the website requesting logging was loaded

experiment.description: If an experiment was running at the time, this is the name of the experiment, e.g. 'SerengetiHappinessExperiment1'

cohort.description: If an experiment was running at the time, this is the name of the cohort this user was assigned to, e.g. 'control'

errorCode.description: if an error occurred in trying to perform this event, the error code will be logged here (e.g. 500)

errorDescription.description: if an error occurred in trying to perform this event, details will be logged here
